FEAT_FIGHTING_STYLE_GREAT_WEAPON.description: when wielding a melee weapon with both hand, you may re-roll damage die if the first roll was 1 or 2

FEAT_FIGHTING_STYLE_DUELLING.description: +2 to damage roll when wielding a one hand weapon, with no shield

FEAT_FIGHTING_STYLE_ARCHERY.description: +2 to attack roll with ranged weapon
